detail_desc: Mesh bikini briefs with decorative trims, a mid waist and lined gusset. Narrow sides, high-cut legs and cutaway coverage at the back.

Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and one button at the front. Lined.
Fully lined bikini top with frills. Non fasteners.

Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and gathered frills at the top.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and gathered frills at the top.
Wide T-shirt in cotton jersey with wide sleeves in a cotton weave. The sleeves have an elasticated seam and slit underneath.
Wide T-shirt in cotton jersey with wide sleeves in a cotton weave. The sleeves have an elasticated seam and slit underneath.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.

Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, a wrapover front, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.

Denim shorts with a regular waist and button fly. Side pockets, a coin pocket with a button and three back pockets, one of which is a welt pocket with a button. Straight legs with shaping seams that have longer hems at the front. Straight fit.

Fully lined bikini bottoms with a V-shaped waist.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with a sheen, with a high-cut V-neck and sewn in wrapover at the top. Asymmetric front with gathers and draping. Lined.
Jumpsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck, short butterfly sleeves, and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist, and slightly slimmer, gently flared legs with creases.

Short lace dress with a transparent yoke and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, seam at the waist and flared skirt with a seam and flounce at the hem. Lined.

Straight-cut jacket in satin crêpe with a collar, jetted front pockets, a slit at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Short dress in sturdy jersey and mesh with a partly transparent top in mesh with lace sections. Long raglan sleeves, a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Partly lined.

Short, fitted lace dress with V-neck, gathers at the front and long, transparent sleeves. Contrasting colour lining front and back.

Short, fitted dress in stretch jersey made from a viscose blend with a small stand-up collar with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. V-neck front and back, long sleeves and a seam at the waist.

Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with gathers in the sides for best fit and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The sweatshirt is layered at the bottom over woven fabric with a rounded hem and decorative button.

Suede biker jacket with notch lapels with press-studs, and a diagonal zip down the front. Two zipped side pockets, one flap front pocket with a press-stud and one zipped front pocket. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs and a sewn-on, adjustable belt with a metal fastener at the hem. Lined.
